mission.posting: A client has asked us to retrieve a special program for him

email.subject: Tick Tock
email.body: This is a bit of an unorthodox one, A client who goes by Aqueous has requested that we retrieve a special program for him. Apparently, his friend managed to get it somehow but refuses to give with him. Bit like little children, to be honest. Anyways, try to get the program and upload it to the client's bin folder. Cheers, -Coel

attachments.note: Retrieve a special program for the client Upload it to his bin folder.
